channel.title: Logging out
channel.description:
Whenever I click the door on the bottom of the screen the log-out button and interface comes up. How could I make it when I click the X button in the top right corner the same interface comes up? I have a PI 317 if you are to ask...
IMAGE: [img]http://i1075.photobucket.com/albums/w426/IMakeTheLedgeEnd/HowtomaketheXbringupthatinterface.png[/img]
